amendment.description: To increase funding by $1 billion for various tribal programs and provide necessary additional funding based on recommendations from Indian country, by closing corporate tax loopholes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3102 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 56. Record Vote Number: 61.

action.text: Amendment SA 3102 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S2235-2236, S2257; text: CR S2235-2236) To increase funding by $1 billion for various tribal programs and provide necessary additional funding based on recommendations from Indian country, by closing corporate tax loopholes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3102 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 56. Record Vote Number: 61.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3102 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 56. Record Vote Number: 61.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3102 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
